gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 136, Hawks 126
gameRecap.excerpt: Ayo Dosunmu led the Bulls with a career-high 29 points, with seven assists as DeMar DeRozan added 29 points, five assists, and three rebounds as Chicago defeated the Hawks, 136-126. Nikola Vucevic (24 points, 11 rebounds) and Coby White (20 points, seven assists) totaled 44 points in the win. Bogdan Bogdanovic (28 points, four assists) and De’Andre Hunter (23 points, six rebounds) led the Hawks as Trae Young added 19 points and 14 assists. The Bulls move to 26-28 as they have won 4 of their last 6 games as the Hawks move to 24-30.
